scripts.version:patch: git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && npm version patch
scripts.version:minor: git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && npm version minor
scripts.version:major: git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && npm version major
scripts.publish:patch: pnpm run version:patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: pnpm run version:minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: pnpm run version:major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
